Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4668.
_description: Gospel for Third Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
TO daie saynte luke þe gospellereSaise sinfull men come criste
                    to here…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þan of many þat hafe no nedeTo do penaunce for
                    synfull dedeþis es þe texte of oure gospelle . Als man etc
                    .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO day seint Luc telleþ vsÞat synful men come to
                    Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And hou hit of heore lesyng felIn stude of tale I wol ow
                    tel

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TO day seint luc telleþ vsÞat synful men come to
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And hou hit of heore lesyng felIn stide of tale I wol ow[sic]
                    tel
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
So say saint luke the gospellersais synfull men come crist to
                    her…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…And how it of our tynynge fellIn stede of tale I will
                    ȝow tell

MinULZ822.First Lines:
To day saynt louke þe gospellereand says þat synfull men
                    com criste to here…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…ihesu for þi mercy vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiia post festum sancte trinitatis Secundum
                        Lucam (f. 105v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
To day seith seint Luc þe gospellereÞat synful men come
                    crist to here…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And how hyt off his tynynge fellIn sted off tale I will
                    ȝow tell
